**Wikipedia summary**:
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p><i><b>Strongylocentrotus droebachiensis</b></i> is commonly known as the <b>green sea urchin</b> because of its characteristic green color, not to be confused with <i>Psammechinus miliaris</i> as it is also commonly called the green sea urchin. It is commonly found in northern waters all around the world including both the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans to a northerly latitude of 81 degrees and as far south as Maine</p>...
